extendedInfo.description: Galaxy S4 Live Wallpaper is an unique experience for your eyes.This Live wallpaper lets you to interact with the water. a wonderful and serene wallpaper for all, children and not, can you set this live wallpaper on all season of your life.Many people like this app as game, they enjoy to touch wallpaper and create fantastic water effect.You can choose 3 different Galaxy S4 backgrounds, other features:** - Customised drop effects** - Smooth waves in water.** - Use 3D hardware to render images, optimizes battery use** - Customised drop effects (radius, displacement, water tail, water sound)How to use:Home -> Menu -> Wallpapers -> Live Wallpapers >> Galaxy S4** Please make sure your smartphone support Live Wallpaper features.****The Wallpaper has been tested on following phones.Samsung Galaxy S4Samsung Galaxy S3Samsung Galaxy YSamsung Galaxy SSamsung Galaxy S2Samsung Galaxy S AdvanceSamsung GalaxyHTC ExplorerLG Optimus OneLG Optimus BlackSony Xperia UMotorola Fire XTMotorola RazrHTC One VBring your phone to life !!***All permissions are for displaying advertisements.Policy transparency regarding the advertisements included:Thanks for installing this app. Creating an app takes time and money. To attempt to keep this app 100% Free this app is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray. You can delete the search shortcuts easily and without any effect for our app (Drag and Drop to the garbage).Tap on screen to ACCEPT the terms or close the app and uninstall it if you don't agree the terms. You can optout notification ads for AirPush optout: http://www.airpush.com/optout ----- for LeadBolt optout: http://opt.leadbolt.comThis app is supported via search. Please note that the following will be added to your device once you download the app Search icon, bookmark link and browser homepage. You can delete/replace these search points easily. This is a way to make money from this app and giving it to you for free. Thank you for your understanding.--DISCLAIMER---All images used in this software product are owned by and are copyrights of their respective owners. All title and intellectual property rights in and to the content which may be accessed through use of the software is the property of the respective content owner and may be protected by applicable copyright or other intellectual property laws and treaties. This EULA grants you no rights to use such conten
